title: Rough Script Type Font with tails on letters.
content:
I'm having trouble finding this font.

[http://i62.servimg.com/u/f62/14/72/54/59/dddddd11.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406063121/http:/i62.servimg.com/u/f62/14/72/54/59/dddddd11.jpg "http://i62.servimg.com/u/f62/14/72/54/59/dddddd11.jpg")
author: brokentrace

comments.content: Bleeding Cowboys ( [free for personal use](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406063121/http:/www.dafont.com/bleeding-cowboys.font)/ [Pro version](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406063121/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/cheapprofonts/bleeding-cowboys-pro)), a roughened version of Harold Lohner's [Oklahoma](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406063121/http:/haroldsfonts.com/portfolio/oklahoma)
